mdRecord.dcterms:title: Smyth County, Va / by Chas. R. Boyd, Geologist, John D. Barns, Topographer. 1899
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boyd, Charles Rufus, 1841-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 78 x 74 cm. on sheet 80 x 81 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A note about the County's role in the preparation of the map follows the title.
Geological cross section from northwest to southeast (with separate vertical scale) on left side of sheet..
Insets: Marion enlarged -- Chilhowie, Va. enlarged.

Includes chemical analysis of cove plaster by M.B. Hardin and of manganese ore from north slope of Rye Valley Mountain by Henry Froehling, Richmond, with an additional note about "salt rock and brine" in the Saltville area.
Includes signed approvals from the Governor and the State Commissioner of Agriculture.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect:: Has several tears. Faced with pink fabric for hanging.
